ProductAttributeSetItem.name: ProductAttributeSetItem
ProductAttributeSetItem.description: Represents a set of attributes that can be associated with a product.

FieldApiName.description: A derived field whose values comes from CustomFieldDefinition object.

IsGroupedBy.description: Indicates if product variations are grouped by a specific attribute.

ProductAttributeSetId.description: The ID of the product attribute set.

Sequence.description: The order that product attributes appear in.
